flawed_nl_solution:
Since Lucas makes 4 pieces of chocolate per student, he has 40 / 4 = <<40/4=10>>10 students.
This upcoming Monday, there will be 10 - 3 = <<10-3=5>>5 students.
Lucas will make 4 * 5 = <<4*5=20>>20 pieces of chocolate candy.
#### 20

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 7, not 5. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
